/>
VIII.iii.10.1.d
.
Definition:  Symptoms of COVID-19
Symptoms of COVID-19
are defined as symptoms that competent medical evidence demonstrates are experienced by an individual and directly related to COVID-19.
Important
:  For the most up-to-date list of known symptoms, refer to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s  (CDC’s) COVID-19 website,
Symptoms of COVID-19 | CDC
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
